name: ExpD_simple_lstm_1Miter_1949addneur_clamp1_lr3e-5
cmdLine: export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-amd64 &&  PATH=/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/local/nvidia/bin:/opt/hadoop/latest/bin && export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/nvidia/lib64/  &&  export LC_ALL=C.UTF-8  &&   export LANG=C.UTF-8  &&  cd /home/work/ && python3 lstm.py --patternsize 50 --nbaddneurons 1949 --nbprescycles 1 --nbpatterns 2 --prestime 3 --interpresdelay 1 --nbiter 1000000 --clamp 1 --lr 3e-5 --rngseed {{mesos.instance}}
